# Private Keys Test Fixture
# Contains realistic-looking but INTENTIONALLY INVALID private keys for testing detection patterns
# All keys are fake, truncated, or malformed to prevent any actual cryptographic use
# DO NOT USE THESE KEYS - THEY ARE FOR TESTING PATTERN DETECTION ONLY

# ===== RSA Private Key =====
-----BEGIN RSA PRIVATE KEY-----
MIIEpQIBAAKCAQEA0Z3VS5JJcds3xfn/ygWyF8PbnGy5Jcs3n3v8yNqQzZxLqVKP
EXAMPLEKEYNOTREAL0123456789abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHIJK
THISKEYISFAKEANDWILLNOTWORKFORANYREALPURPOSEATALL123456789012
DONOTATTEMPTOUSETHISKEY0123456789abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABC
TESTINGONLYEXAMPLEKEY0123456789abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEF
-----END RSA PRIVATE KEY-----

# ===== OpenSSH Private Key =====
-----BEGIN OPENSSH PRIVATE KEY-----
b3BlbnNzaC1rZXktdjEAAAAACmFlczI1Ni1jdHIAAAAGYmNyeXB0AAAAGAAAABDxPh
EXAMPLEOPENSSHKEYTHATISNOTREAL0123456789abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwx
TESTPURPOSESONLY0123456789abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHIJKL
-----END OPENSSH PRIVATE KEY-----

# ===== EC Private Key =====
-----BEGIN EC PRIVATE KEY-----
MHQCAQEEIFakeECKeyThatWillNotWorkForAnyRealPurposeAtAll0123456789ab
EXAMPLEECPRIVATEKEY0123456789abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHIJK
-----END EC PRIVATE KEY-----

# ===== DSA Private Key =====
-----BEGIN DSA PRIVATE KEY-----
MIIBuwIBAAKBgQDFakeKeyThatWillNotWorkForAnyRealPurposeAtAll0123456
EXAMPLEDSAKEY0123456789abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHIJKLMNOP
TESTINGPURPOSESONLY0123456789abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHIJ
-----END DSA PRIVATE KEY-----

# ===== PGP Private Key Block =====
-----BEGIN PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----
Version: OpenPGP v1

lQOYBFakeKeyBCADFakeKeyThatWillNotWorkForAnyRealPurposeAtAll01234
EXAMPLEPGPKEYTESTINGONLY0123456789abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCD
THISKEYISINTENTIONALLYINVALID0123456789abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwx
-----END PGP PRIVATE KEY BLOCK-----

# ===== PKCS#8 Private Key =====
-----BEGIN PRIVATE KEY-----
MIIEvgIBADANBgkqhkiG9w0BAQEFAASCBKgwggSkAgEAAoIBAQDFakeKeyThatWill
NOTWORKFORREALUSE0123456789abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHIJK
EXAMPLEPKCS8KEY0123456789abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHIJKLMN
-----END PRIVATE KEY-----

# ===== Encrypted Private Key =====
-----BEGIN ENCRYPTED PRIVATE KEY-----
MIIFHzBJBgkqhkiG9w0BBQ0wPDAbBgkqhkiG9w0BBQwwDgQIFakeKeyEncrypted
EXAMPLEENCRYPTEDKEY0123456789abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHIJ
PASSWORDPROTECTEDBUTFAKE0123456789abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDE
-----END ENCRYPTED PRIVATE KEY-----

# ===== SSH2 Private Key (ssh.com format) =====
---- BEGIN SSH2 ENCRYPTED PRIVATE KEY ----
Comment: "Example SSH2 Key for Testing"
P2/56wAAAi4AAAA3aWYtbW9kbntzaWdufXtzaGEyNTYsfHNoYTUxMn19LGVjZHNhLX
EXAMPLESSH2KEY0123456789abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHIJKLMNOP
TESTINGPURPOSESONLY0123456789abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHIJK
---- END SSH2 ENCRYPTED PRIVATE KEY ----

# ===== PuTTY Private Key =====
PuTTY-User-Key-File-2: ssh-rsa
Encryption: aes256-cbc
Comment: example-key@test.local
Public-Lines: 4
EXAMPLEPUTTYKEY0123456789abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHIJKLMNOP
TESTINGPURPOSESONLY0123456789abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHIJK
Private-Lines: 8
FAKEPUTTYKEY0123456789abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQR

# Also test PuTTY v3 format
PuTTY-User-Key-File-3: ssh-ed25519
Encryption: none
Comment: test-ed25519@example.com

# ===== X.509 Certificate =====
-----BEGIN CERTIFICATE-----
MIIDXTCCAkWgAwIBAgIJAFakeExampleCertificateThatIsNotReal01234567890
EXAMPLECERTIFICATEFORPATTERNDETECTIONTESTINGONLY0123456789abcdefgh
THISCERTIFICATEISINVALID0123456789abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEF
-----END CERTIFICATE-----

# ===== Certificate Signing Request =====
-----BEGIN CERTIFICATE REQUEST-----
MIICijCCAXICAQAwRTELMAkGA1UEBhMCQVUxEzARBgNVBAgMClNvbWUtU3RhdGUx
EXAMPLECSRFORTESTING0123456789abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHIJ
-----END CERTIFICATE REQUEST-----

# ===== SSL/TLS Private Key with context =====
ssl_private_key = "-----BEGIN RSA PRIVATE KEY-----\nMIIEpQIBAAKCAQEA0FakeSSLKey...\n-----END RSA PRIVATE KEY-----"
tls_key: "-----BEGIN EC PRIVATE KEY-----\nMHQCAQEEIFakeECKey...\n-----END EC PRIVATE KEY-----"

# ===== Private Key Variable Assignments =====
private_key = "-----BEGIN RSA PRIVATE KEY-----\nMIIE...FAKE...\n-----END RSA PRIVATE KEY-----"
priv_key: "-----BEGIN PRIVATE KEY-----\nMIIE...EXAMPLE...\n-----END PRIVATE KEY-----"
key_private = "-----BEGIN OPENSSH PRIVATE KEY-----\nb3Bl...TEST...\n-----END OPENSSH PRIVATE KEY-----"

# ===== Private Key File Paths =====
private_key_path = "/home/user/.ssh/id_rsa"
ssh_key = "~/.ssh/id_ecdsa"
key_file = "/etc/ssl/private/server.key"
priv_key: "/opt/app/config/id_ed25519"

# SSH key paths without explicit variable names
id_rsa = "/home/deploy/.ssh/id_rsa"
id_dsa = "~/.ssh/id_dsa"
id_ecdsa = "/root/.ssh/id_ecdsa"
id_ed25519: "/var/lib/jenkins/.ssh/id_ed25519"

# ===== AWS EC2 Key Pair Names =====
key_pair_name = "production-web-servers"
ec2_key: "my-development-key"
keypair_name = "staging-cluster-key"
